effect.x_y: Heals the user for half its max HP.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Heals the user for half its max HP.

short_effect.x_y: Heals the user by half its max HP.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Heals the user by half its max HP.

flavor_text.x_y: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.
